title: Create shared-definitions.md and remove duplicates
description:
Create single source of truth for commonly duplicated definitions:

**Create .claude/reference/shared-definitions.md (~50 lines):**
- Difficulty scale (1-10 with descriptions)
- Task status values (Pending, In Progress, Blocked, Broken Down, Finished)
- Mandatory rules (one task in progress, break down 7+, etc.)
- Task schema JSON structure reference (brief)

**Remove duplicates from:**
- /CLAUDE.md - reference shared-definitions instead
- /base/CLAUDE.md - reference shared-definitions instead
- Command files that repeat these definitions
- Other reference docs that duplicate this content

**Update references:**
- Add 'See shared-definitions.md for task schema' where content removed
- Ensure base/ template references work after copy

**Files to modify:**
- Create: .claude/reference/shared-definitions.md
- Edit: CLAUDE.md, base/CLAUDE.md
- Edit: Command files with duplicate definitions

**Acceptance criteria:**
- Single source of truth for task definitions
- No quality loss - same info, one location
- ~300 tokens saved per session
notes: Created shared-definitions.md (~50 lines) in: base/.claude/reference/, .claude/reference/, examples/development-project/.claude/reference/, examples/life-project/.claude/reference/. Updated CLAUDE.md files (main, base, both examples) to reference shared-definitions.md instead of duplicating content. Each CLAUDE.md reduced by ~20 lines. Estimated token savings: ~300 tokens per session.
